
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(validator-ut-validator_checks)
target_link_libraries(validator-ut-validator_checks PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  library-yaml_config-validator
)
target_sources(validator-ut-validator_checks PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yaml_config/validator/ut/validator_checks/validator_checks_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  validator-ut-validator_checks
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  validator-ut-validator_checks
  TEST_TARGET
  validator-ut-validator_checks
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  validator-ut-validator_checks
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  validator-ut-validator_checks
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
target_allocator(validator-ut-validator_checks
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(validator-ut-validator_checks)
